document.title: Upper Arch Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: This treatment plan involves using clear aligners to adjust the upper teeth. The process is anticipated to take approximately 4-6 months. Given the simplicity of the case, progress will be primarily monitored remotely, minimizing the need for in-office visits. Attachments will be used to facilitate specific tooth movements. Whitening is included as part of this treatment plan, adding an extra benefit to enhance your smile.
key_points: Clear aligners for upper teeth only
Remote monitoring with minimal in-office visits
Some attachments to aid tooth movement
Whitening included in the treatment plan
next_steps: Review patient progress through remote monitoring channels
Ensure patient is informed about the use of attachments and their role
Prepare whitening materials for inclusion at the appropriate stage of treatment
